html:
will I sing. Isaiah sings a song about the Lord and the house of Israel.

vineyard. The house of Israel. This song can appropriately be applied to the Lord's covenant people in all ages.

well-beloved. The Lord of Hosts, who is the owner of the vineyard (5:1, 7a).

fertile hill. The promised covenant land of Israel where God planted his vineyard, or the house of Israel.
